text: The Winning Team is a 1952 biographical movie directed by Lewis Seiler. It is about the life of major league pitcher Grover Cleveland Alexander. It stars Ronald Reagan, Doris Day, and Russ Tamblyn. It was released on June 20, 1952. Category:1952 movies Category:1950s biographical movies Category:American biographical movies Category:Movies directed by Lewis Seiler
title: The Winning Team
